short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A smoking cessation chrome extension that redirects to custom URL if keyboard press + mouse click do not occur every 30 sec.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Can you follow your urges to smoke if both your hands are busy?
Extension adds a 30 second timer to every web page visited. Only way to reset the timer is to press a key with your left hand and mouse-click with your right. Failure to do so redirects the webpage to a custom URL (configured in the options menu). 

Redirection can be set to any URL (we suggest a smoking cessation help site, or a Wikipedia article on lung cancer) 






this was non-serious project I thought of driving home the other day. If it works/helps please let me know though to make improvements :)
